data.name: AuthoredMap.TypeNotSupported
data.value: This map type is not supported.

data.name: Form1.NewVersionAvailable
data.value: A newer version of this program is available online. Would you like to visit the web page?

data.name: Game.EndOfGame
data.value: You have met the end of game requirements. Continue to the next player to allow each player the same number of turns.

data.name: Game.NotSpentAny
data.value: You have not spent any time or money so far this turn. Are you sure you want to give up the remainder of your turn?

data.name: Game.AllYourBase
data.value: All of your freight cars are full. You must unload a car before you can pick up another commodity.

data.name: Game.NoProfit
data.value: You won't earn any money for this cargo. Are you sure you want to unload it?

data.name: Game.CannotUnload
data.value: You cannot unload cargo in {0} until the current emergency has ended.

data.name: Game.NoTimeToUpgrade
data.value: There is not enough time left in your turn to upgrade your train.

data.name: Game.CannotLoad
data.value: You cannot load cargo in {0} until the current emergency has ended.

data.name: Game.CannotReach
data.value: That location cannot be reached at this time.

data.name: Game.NoTimeToMove
data.value: There is not enough time remaining in your turn to move further.

data.name: Game.AlreadyOfficial
data.value: The game is already official, so if you quit now it will be recorded as a loss for all players. Are you sure you want to quit?

data.name: Game.NoTimeToLoad
data.value: There is not enough time remaining in your turn to load cargo.

data.name: Game.OtherTrackCost
data.value: Using another player's track costs {0}, which would exceed your spending limit.

data.name: Game.NoTimeToUnload
data.value: There is not enough time remaining in your turn to unload cargo.

data.name: Game.NoMoneyToUpgrade
data.value: You have already spent money this turn. Train upgrades cost {0} and therefore require all of your spending limit.

data.name: ChooseTrack.IndicatePlayers
data.value: Indicate which players' tracks to ride this turn:

data.name: Game.WinLossError
data.value: There is an error in the winloss.rec file. Please delete or rename this file to continue.

data.name: MapGallery.AreYouSure
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the map?

data.name: MapGallery.DeleteError
data.value: An error occurred when trying to delete the map.

data.name: MapGallery.LoadError
data.value: An error occurred while trying to load the map gallery.

data.name: WinLoss.Warning
data.value: WARNING: This action will delete all of the player records and game history. Are you sure you want to do that?

data.name: GameState.VersionNotSupport
data.value: This version of the saved game file is no longer supported. Delete the game.sav file, or run a version that supports it.

data.name: RandomMap2.UnsupportedMapName
data.value: The specified map name is not understood by this version of the game. A new random map will be created instead.

data.name: Startup.Abandon
data.value: There is a game currently in progress. Do you want to abandon it?
